OOC:: dischart my last I haven't read all when I wrote it.
BIC:

Aelo/Perceptor/Ocipite::

The shuttles of Darkfate's troops shot against Energonian Shuttle.

Alecto: "Alecto to Greven " said the femme "Anyone need our help?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Greven/Scyther::
> 
> Greven was ready this time, and successfully dodged both shots. 
> Scyther's shuttle passes him, continuing to fire at the Energonian 
> shuttle.
> 
> 
>

> >        The Energonian shuttles quickly picked up Scayther, Aleo, 
> Celeno,

> chance of a 
> > hard battle arising in this situation. Ominous commanded they 
stay 
> and fight.

> leaking

> shuttle, 
> > Akrons shuttle made a sharp about face and sent three energon 
> missles raining 
> > down on Aleo's vessle.
> >        As for Greven, Ominous targeted him agian and fired. This 
> time only

ready 
> weapons
